name: Hamster Wave
description:
Hamster Wave

Entry for InnoGames Jam 2017 And Global Game Jam 2017

Your older sister takes revenge on you putting your lovely hamster in the microwave. Save him before it's too late!

Video

Watch some gameplay on YouTube

Controls

Use your mouse!
